thread.title: Close to Eiffle Tower. Next door to Metro so ver easy to access Paris!
thread.title_full: Close to Eiffle Tower. Next door to Metro so ver easy to access Paris! - Review of Hotel Eiffel Seine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JULIE P
title: Close to Eiffle Tower. Next door to Metro so ver easy to access Paris!
text:
Clean, nicely decorated hotel. Friendly staff. Get free breakfast if book directly with hotel. Great as a base for a break! Restruants nearby charge over 8euros for a coke to bump price of a meal up so watch out!! Was cheaper to dink alcohol!
Room Tip: No view of tower! Would possibly get a view of Siene if on floor 3/4 but otherwise no view to speak... See more room tips
